Filip Kostić za MOZZART Sport posle rasturanja Bajerna: Teže mi je u reprezentaciji, nema vremena za uigravanje...
Srpski as uživa u veličanstvenom trijumfu nad Bavarcima...
03 Nov 2019 by Milan Zdravković
Titula najboljeg igrača 10. kola u Bundesligi verovatno će završiti u rukama Tima Vernera. Očekivano, nemački reprezentativac je dao tri komada nejakom Majncu u trijumfu Lajpciga od čak 8:0, ali ako gledamo opšti stav nemačkih novinara ubedljivo najbolji utisak u subotu popodne ostavio je naš Filip Kostić, arhitekta veličanstvenog trijumfa Ajntrahta nad Bajernom od čak 5:1.
Gol i dve asistencije (najviša ocena 1 u Bildu i ostalim medijima) učinak je srpskog krilnog napadača u okršaju sa dominantnim šampionom Nemačke, koji je posle više od deset godina primio pet komada na jednoj utakmici. Dovoljan razlog za mali nedeljni mini-intervju sa zvezdom dana u Bundesligi dok se uz meč Fortuna - Keln odmara od napornog okršaja s Bavarcima."Ne znam da li je neki tim u poslednjih nekoliko godina uspeo da postigne pet golova protiv Bajerna. Meni to nije poznato. Znam samo da je protiv Bajerna svaki igrač dodatno motivisan, a Ajntraht je juče bio žestoko motivisan", kaže Kostić na početku razgovora za MOZZART Sport.
Da li si svestan da si dobrom igrom možda potpisao i otkaz Niku Kovaču?"U fudbalu je normalno da ekipa ima oscilacije u formi. Svaka ekipa, ne samo Bajern. Mogu samo da kažem da je Niko Kovač dobar trener."
Jeste li možda pričali posle utakmice, šta ti je Kovač rekao?"Nismo pričali posle utakmice."
Šta bi ti savetovao Bajernu da učini, da ga otpusti ili zadrži?"Savetovao bih im da ga zadrže. Ne treba zaboraviti da je pre nekoliko nedelja dao Totenhemu čak sedam golova u gostima. To je samo mala kriza koja će se prebroditi. Ipak je Bajern institucija, bez obzira na pet golova koje je primio juče."



Najčešći komentar čitalaca u izveštaju sa jučerašnje utakmice bio je ujedno i pitanje - šta to Filipu nedostaje u reprezentaciji Srbije da bi bio na istom nivou kao u Ajntrahtu?"Mislim da je u reprezentaciji malo teže jer nemam puno vremena za uigravanje. Ovde u Ajntrahtu svakog dana treniram sa ekipom i lako se snalazim na terenu, dok je u Srbiji potrebno više vremena kojeg često nema zbog zgusnutog rasporeda."
Može li Ajntraht do titule u ovoj ludoj sezoni Bundeslige?"Teško... Treba biti realan. Jedino što mislim da imamo šansu da budemo u prve četiri ekipe i izborimo Ligu šampiona. Svakako da će nijanse odlučivati jer je kompletna sezona ove godine izjednačena, ali mislim da možemo dosta". 
Da li je jučerašnja utakmica pokazala da si prerastao nemački fudbal?"Već šestu godinu igram u Nemačkoj i lepo mi je. Uživam i ne razmišljam o promeni sredine", poručuje Filip Kostić.

Foto: Reuters

Filip Kostic for MOZZART Sport after Breaking Bayern: It's harder for me in the national team, no time to play ...
Serbian ace enjoys magnificent triumph over Bavarians ...
03 Nov 2019 by Milan Zdravkovic
The 10th round Bundesliga title is likely to end in the hands of Tim Werner. As expected, the German national team gave three pieces to the weak Mainz in the Leipzig triumph of as much as 8: 0, but looking at the general attitude of German journalists, the best impression on Saturday afternoon left our Filip Kostic, architect of the magnificent triumph of Eintracht over Bayern 5: 1.
A goal and two assists (the highest score of 1 in the Bild and other media) is the performance of the Serbian winger in the clash with the dominant champion of Germany, who after five years received five pieces in one game. Sufficient reason for a small weekly mini-interview with the Bundesliga star of the day as the Fortuna-Cologne match rests on a strenuous feud with the Bavarians. "I don't know if any team has managed to score five goals against Bayern in recent years. I only know that against Bayern every player is additionally motivated, and Eintracht was fiercely motivated yesterday, "Kostic says at the start of the interview for MOZZART Sport.
Are you aware that you may have signed a good game with Nico Kovac's dismissal? "In football, it is normal for a team to have oscillations in form. Every team, not just Bayern. I can only say that Niko Kovac is a good coach."
Did you talk after the game, what did Kovac say to you? "We didn't talk after the game."
What would you advise Bayern to do, fire him or keep him? "I would advise them to keep him. It should be remembered that he gave Tottenham even seven away goals a few weeks ago. It's just a small crisis to overcome. Bayern institution, notwithstanding the five goals it received yesterday. "



Readers' most frequent comment in the report from yesterday's game was also the question - what does Philip lack in the Serbian national team to be on the same level as in Eintracht? "I think it is a little harder in the national team because I don't have much time to play. I train with the team for days and easily navigate the field, while in Serbia it takes more time, which is often not due to a tight schedule. "
Could Eintracht reach the title in this crazy Bundesliga season? "Hard ... It has to be realistic. The only thing I think is that we have a chance to be in the top four teams and win the Champions League. but I think we can do a lot. "
Did yesterday's game show that you have outgrown German football? "I have been playing in Germany for the sixth year and it is nice for me. I enjoy and do not think about changing the environment," says Filip Kostic.
